function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Marginalization of community participation in global malaria efforts","Impact":"Ineffective long-term funding and investment by global agencies","Mitigation":"Increase evidence-base for effectiveness of community participation in malaria efforts","Technologies":"Social science research, vulnerability and exposure indexes","People":"Community members, migrants, indigenous groups, ethnic minorities, poor rural communities","Owner":"Global agencies, research organizations"},{"Description":"Spread of artemisinin-resistant malaria among mobile and migrant populations in Cambodia","Impact":"Increased threat to public health and malaria elimination efforts","Mitigation":"Implementation of mobile and migrant malaria plan, targeted interventions based on risk profiles","Technologies":"Risk profiles, vulnerability and exposure indexes, access to health services index","People":"Mobile and migrant populations in Cambodia, forest workers, mine workers, security personnel, visitors, cross-border travelers","Owner":"Cambodia's National Malaria Elimination Strategy, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Stigmatization of vulnerable social groups in malaria interventions","Impact":"Social marginalization, hindrance to strengthening resilience and adaptive capacity","Mitigation":"Avoid using language that blames specific groups as a source of infection and spread","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Migrants, indigenous groups, ethnic minorities, poor rural communities","Owner":"Malaria intervention projects, public health organizations"}]}
